Hello. I'm Erin.

I'm a former Interactive Project Manager turned developer. A Chicago native, I've lived in Milwaukee, Minneapolis, and have recently found myself in Denver as I work through Turing School of Software and Design's backend development program. When I'm not questioning why I've decided to go rogue and start programming, you'll probably find me hanging out with my dogs Bruce and Tucker or whipping up a new recipe in the kitchen (I've seen every episode of Chopped, so obviously I'm a pretty great chef myself now).
